p: qPCR of the target genes including elovl6, hnf1α, cebpβ, rxrα, and creb1 was performed in a quantitative thermal cycler (CFX96TM Real-Time System, BIO-RAD, Hercules, CA, USA) by SYBR Green real-time PCR kit (Takara, Japan) according to a previously described procedure [ 31]. The primer sequences of genes were listed in Table 1. The 2 -ΔΔCT method was used to calculate the relative expression of genes [ 32].
